mapper.select: SELECT id,node_code,use_water_unit_id,unit_code,contacts,mobile_number,phone_number, CASE main WHEN '1' THEN '主联系人' WHEN '0' THEN '备用联系人' END AS main, open_id,deleted,locked,wrong_times FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE deleted = '0' AND use_water_unit_id = #{useWaterUnitId} ORDER BY main DESC
SELECT mobile_number,contacts FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE unit_code = #{unitCode} AND main ='1' AND deleted = '0'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE deleted = '0' AND main = '1' AND use_water_unit_id = #{orgId}

SELECT id, node_code, unit_code, unit_name, unit_address, department FROM t_w_use_water_unit t1 where 1 = 1
and unit_code = #{unitCode}
and id IN ( SELECT use_water_unit_id FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE 1 = 1 and mobile_number = #{mobileNumber} AND deleted = '0' )
AND SUBSTRING ( unit_code, 5, 2 ) IN ( SELECT unit_type_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role WHERE person_id = #{personId} )

SELECT person_id FROM t_w_use_water_unit_role t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTRING ( unit_code, 5, 2 ) AS unit_code FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE deleted = '0' AND unit_code = #{unitCode} ) t2 ON t1.unit_type_code = t2.unit_code

SELECT contacts FROM t_w_use_water_unit_contacts WHERE deleted = '0' AND use_water_unit_id = #{id}
AND open_id != #{openId}
